service_name: Xage Security OT Secure Remote Access

capabilities.name: Zero Trust Remote Access Gateway
capabilities.description: Provides identity-based, granular access to OT assets without exposing the broader network (replaces flat VPN access).

capabilities.name: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) Integration
capabilities.description: Enforces MFA and single sign-on for remote sessions even on legacy OT systems lacking native support.

capabilities.name: Unified Access Management
capabilities.description: Centralizes user and device authentication across IT and OT, supporting integration with Active Directory and role-based access control.

capabilities.name: Comprehensive Session Logging
capabilities.description: Captures detailed logs of remote session activity and provides tamper-proof audit trails for compliance.

capabilities.name: Device Posture Verification
capabilities.description: Checks the security posture of remote clients (OS patch level, antivirus) before granting OT access.

operating_context.environment: Multi-site industrial OT (factory networks with Siemens, Rockwell, and Schneider Electric equipment)
operating_context.user_types: Plant engineers, OT system integrators, third-party vendor technicians

maturity.model: Internal 1-5 scale aligned with industrial cybersecurity best practices

AI_recommendations.recommendation: Provide specialized training for OT personnel and IT staff on the Xage zero trust system and new access procedures
AI_recommendations.trigger: OT staff or contractors attempting to bypass controls due to unfamiliarity

AI_recommendations.recommendation: Develop strict access policies per user role and site, limiting vendor access to only required assets
AI_recommendations.trigger: Initial assessments show overly broad access privileges for some user groups

AI_recommendations.recommendation: Integrate Xage logs with the Security Operations Center (SIEM) for continuous monitoring
AI_recommendations.trigger: Need for unified monitoring of OT remote access activities alongside IT security events

AI_recommendations.recommendation: Enable device posture checks and automatic session termination on detecting insecure devices or anomalies
AI_recommendations.trigger: Varied security hygiene of devices used by vendors and engineers for remote access
